attributes.action: ask the Home Secretary to do the desent thing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Should Gary Mckinnon commit suicide as the result of being extradited to America, then the Prime Minister should hand a loaded revolver to the Home Secetary and send him into the lobby with the express instructions that he should do the desent thing, that is shoot himself dead.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
